item.title: Mike add a quote by Mike Philbin
item.description: "this is a Free Planet." -- Mike Philbin

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mike Philbin
item.description: "The best a writer can hope for is hatred by the masses, revulsion among one's peers." -- Mike Philbin

item.title: Mike add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Mike add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "Reality is that which, when you stop believing in it, doesn't go away." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Mike add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "There's no such thing as perfect writing, just like there's no such thing as perfect despair." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Mike add a quote by Octavia E. Butler
item.description:
"All that you touch You Change.
All that you Change Changes you.
The only lasting truth is Change.
God is Change." -- Octavia E. Butler

item.title: Mike add a quote by Alasdair Gray
item.description: "Work as if you live in the early days of a better nation." -- Alasdair Gray

item.title: Mike add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Mike add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mike Philbin
item.description: "God is the STRUCTURE of Life, not the Narrative." -- Mike Philbin

item.title: Mike add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "Because today we live in a society in which spurious realities are manufactured by the media, by governments, by big corporations, by religious groups, political groups... So I ask, in my writing, What is real? Because unceasingly we are bombarded with pseudo-realities manufactured by very sophisticated people using very sophisticated electronic mechanisms. I do not distrust their motives; I distrust their power. They have a lot of it. And it is an astonishing power: that of creating whole universes, universes of the mind. I ought to know. I do the same thing." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Mike add a quote by Mike Philbin
item.description: "I'm so passionate about my writing, there's page-spunk pouring out of my fingertips." -- Mike Philbin
